external_games.name: Girl Wars: Fantasy World Unification Battle

name: Girl Wars: Fantasy World Unification Battle
storyline:
In the infinite space
the other「land」 exists in the parallel world
It is blessed by the gods and people live a steady life here
But the Devil senses the power in the land!

It has already come...

The dark seeds are planted quietly and start to take root.
The peaceful life is gone!

Only you are able to change the fate of land!
All of ancient and modern pretty Heroines get together to fight with you!

Try your best to defeat the Devil!
In the Fantasy World, fight together with the cute girls!
summary: Anime mobile game set in a fantasy world, The Savior fights with pretty girls to defeat the Devil in the fantasy world!
